name: memoria
description: in-memory database/ORM and http mock server you can run in-browser and node environments. Built for large frontend teams, fast tests and rapid prototyping
author: Izel Nakri

scripts.build: node scripts/change-entrypoints.js ts && npm run libs:build
scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:node
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:browser:ci && npm run test:node:ci
scripts.test:browser:watch: ENVIRONMENT=development npm run build && qunitx packages/@memoria/adapters/*/memory packages/@memoria/adapters/*/rest packages/@memoria/adapters/*/memory packages/@memoria/model packages/@memoria/response packages/@memoria/server/src/index.ts test/browser.ts --watch --browser --debug --failFast --before=packages/@memoria/server/test/helpers/webserver-for-passthrough.js
scripts.test:node:ci: npm run build && c8 --reporter=lcov qunitx test/index.ts --before=packages/@memoria/server/test/helpers/webserver-for-passthrough.js --failFast
scripts.test:node:debug: ENVIRONMENT=development npm run build && qunitx packages/@memoria/adapters/*/memory packages/@memoria/adapters/*/rest packages/@memoria/adapters/*/sql packages/@memoria/model test/index.ts --watch --debug --before=packages/@memoria/server/test/helpers/webserver-for-passthrough.js
scripts.test:node:watch: ENVIRONMENT=development npm run build && qunitx packages/@memoria/adapters/*/memory packages/@memoria/adapters/*/rest packages/@memoria/adapters/*/sql packages/@memoria/model test/index.ts --watch --before=packages/@memoria/server/test/helpers/webserver-for-passthrough.js
scripts.sketchpad: ENVIRONMENT=development npm run libs:build && node scripts/change-entrypoints.js js && esbuild sketchpad.ts --outfile=sketchpad.js && node sketchpad.js

hooks.after:bump: npm run changelog:update && npm run libs:release ${version}
